title: Placed Top 4 But I Didn't Gain LP?
body: I placed top 4 just barely because the guy to-be 5th place died just before I did. However, I still didn't gain LP and I'm still IRON II 0 LP.

replies.body: Was it a normal game? Have to make sure and check it everytime before you click play. I have done this a few times as well.
